description:
The missing link to the 12-speed Eagle drivetrain. SRAM went back to the drawing board to push their new groupset to 12 speed, and created a new chain to get there. New chain, new technology, new manufacturing process and what might be the quietest, strongest, most wear-resistant chain in the world – that's all.

  • Flatter plate results in noise reduction, more consistent chain riveting and greater strength
  • Chain links features smooth radius and no chamfers for reduced friction and wear
  • Titanium Nitride coating resists corrosion and wear
  • Durable hard chrome technology and nickel plating
  • Eagle Powerlock chain connector is designed for better chain guiding and longevity
  • Chrome hardened hollow pins keeps the weight low
  • 126 links
name: SRAM PC-XX1 EAGLE 12 Speed Chain
